name: Kayalina
description:
Kayalina is an interactive comics with 3D art. Most of the story is told through pictures rather than text. The length of the story is determined by your choices. The story contains sexual content, nudity and violence.

Kayalina is a strong and beautiful Amazon who has recently heard about the Demon Queen`s hidden treasure from the townsfolk. She decided to get her hands on the treasure and sat out on a journey.

Features:
-Enjoy a slideshow type story with 3D art
-Take full responsibility for your actions and decisions
-Nudity, sexual content and violence


The art was made in 1080p resolution, thus, the text scaling was only optimized for 1080p. Using another resolution may cause problems with text scaling or popping up.
